messages.en: The device has been turned off

messages.content: કૃપા કરીને ઉપકરણને શરૂ કરવા માટે ટોચના કાપ નીચે સ્વિચને દબાવો અને હોમ સ્ક્રીન પર પેરામીટરો દેખાય ત્યાં સુધી રાહ જુઓ. જો ઉપકરણ ચાલુ ન થાય, તો બેટરીની સ્થિતિ તપાસો અને જરૂર પડે તો ઉપકરણને પુનઃપ્રારંભ કરો.
messages.en: Please press the switch down the top cut to start the device and wait until the parameters appear on the home screen. If the device is not turned on, check the state of the battery and restart the device if needed.

messages.content: NNW ಅಂದ್ರೆ "North-Northwest" (ಉತ್ತರ-ಉತ್ತರಪಶ್ಚಿಮ) ಎಂಬುದನ್ನು ಸೂಚಿಸುತ್ತದೆ. ಇದು ದಿಕ್ಕುಗಳನ್ನು ಸೂಚಿಸುವ ಒಂದು ಪದವಾಗಿದೆ, ಮತ್ತು ಇದು ಉತ್ತರ ಮತ್ತು ಉತ್ತರಪಶ್ಚಿಮದ ನಡುವಿನ ದಿಕ್ಕನ್ನು ಸೂಚಿಸುತ್ತದೆ.
messages.en: NNW stands for "North-Northwest" (North-Northwest). It is a term that denotes directions, and it refers to the direction between north and northwest.

messages.content: પ્લોટ 2 નું સેન્સર બંધ કેમ થઈ ગયું છે
messages.en: Why plot 2's sensor is turned off
messages.standalone_question: Why has the sensor for Plot 2 turned off?
messages.standalone_en: Why has the sensor for Plot 2 turned off?
messages.content_transliterated: plot 2 nu sensor bandh came thai gayu che

messages.content:
જો પ્લોટ 2 નું સેન્સર બંધ થઈ ગયું છે, તો તેના માટે કેટલાક સંભવિત કારણો હોઈ શકે છે:

1. **વાયર કાપી ગયો છે**: સેન્સરનું કનેક્ટર ખૂણામાંથી છૂટું થઈ ગયું હોય અથવા વાયર કાપી ગયો હોય.
2. **બેટરીની સમસ્યા**: સેન્સરમાં બેટરી ખતમ થઈ ગઈ હોઈ શકે છે.
3. **સેન્સરનું નુકસાન**: સેન્સર પોતે ખોટું થઈ ગયું હોય અથવા તેમાં કોઈ તકલીફ આવી હોય.

તમારે સેન્સરની શારીરિક ચકાસણી કરવાની જરૂર છે. જો તમે ચકાસી શકતા નથી, તો ટેકનિકલ સપોર્ટ માટે ટિકિટ બનાવવાની સલાહ આપવામાં આવે છે. શું હું તમને ટેકનિકલ સપોર્ટ માટે ટિકિટ બનાવવામાં મદદ કરી શકું?
messages.en:
If plot 2's sensor has gone off, there could be some possible reasons for it:

1. **The wire has been cut**: The connector of the sensor has been disconnected from the corner or the wire has been cut.
2. **Battery problem**: The battery in the sensor may have run out.
3. **Sensor damage**: The sensor itself may have gone wrong or there may have been a problem with it.

You need to physically check the sensor. If you can't check, it is advisable to make a ticket for technical support. Can I help you make tickets for technical support?

messages.content: रोग ओळखा न माहिती सांगा खोळाचे पान सुट्टे झालेले आहे कशामुळे होत आहे<user uploaded image for analysis at 'samadhanfarm1/2025-02-25-1740469643963.jpg'>
messages.en: Identify the disease Or tell the information What is causing the page of the trunk<user uploaded image for analysis at 'samadhanfarm1/2025-02-25-1740469643963.jpg' >
messages.standalone_question: What could be the cause of the leaves of the plant being detached?
messages.standalone_en: What could be the cause of the leaves of the plant being detached?
messages.content_transliterated: rog olakha n mahiti sanga kholache pan sutte jhalele aahe kashamule hot aahe<user uploaded image for analysis at 'samadhanfarm1/2025-02-25-1740469643963.jpg'>

messages.content:
तुमच्या खोळाच्या पानांवर काही समस्या दिसत आहेत. खालील गोष्टी तपासण्याची शिफारस केली जाते:

1. **पानांचे रंग बदलणे**: पानांचे पिवळे किंवा तपकिरी होणे म्हणजे पोषणाची कमतरता किंवा रोगाची लक्षणे असू शकतात.
2. **कीडांचा हल्ला**: पानांवर किंवा तणांवर कोणत्याही दृश्यमान कीडांचा किंवा कीडांच्या क्रियाकलापांचा शोध घ्या.
3. **मातीची स्थिती**: माती चांगली निचरा झालेली आहे का आणि ती जास्त घट्ट नाही का, हे सुनिश्चित करा, कारण यामुळे मुळांची आरोग्य प्रभावित होऊ शकते.

अधिक अचूक निदान आणि उपचारांसाठी, कृपया प्रभावित भागांवर लक्ष केंद्रित करून एक स्पष्ट चित्र प्रदान करा, ज्यामुळे चांगली प्रकाश आणि फोकस असेल. यामुळे कोणत्याही विशिष्ट रोग किंवा कीड ओळखण्यात मदत होईल.
messages.en:
There are some problems on the leaves of your skull. It is recommended to check the following:

1. **Changing the color of the leaves**: Yellowing or browning of the leaves can be symptoms of nutritional deficiencies or disease.
2. **Insect attack**: Look for any visible insect or insect activity on leaves or weeds.
3. **Soil condition**: Make sure the soil is well drained and not too tight, as this can affect the health of the roots.

For a more accurate diagnosis and treatment, please provide a clear picture by focusing on the affected areas, which will lead to better lighting and focus. This will help identify any specific diseases or pests.

messages.standalone_question: What could be the reasons for the leaves of the stem to be falling off?
messages.standalone_en: What could be the reasons for the leaves of the stem to be falling off?
messages.content_transliterated: khodache pan ka sutte jhalele aahe te mahiti sanga<user uploaded image for analysis at 'samadhanfarm1/2025-02-25-1740469870041.jpg'>

messages.content:
तुमच्या खोळाच्या पानांवर काही समस्या दिसत आहेत. खालील गोष्टींचा विचार केला जाऊ शकतो:

1. **फंगस संक्रमण**: पानांच्या तळाशी तपकिरी आणि सुटलेले भाग फंगस रोग, जसे की पनामा रोग किंवा काळा सिगाटोका, यांचे लक्षण असू शकतात.
2. **पोषणाची कमतरता**: पानांचे पिवळे होणे आणि एकूण आरोग्य कमी असणे आवश्यक पोषणाची कमतरता दर्शवू शकते.
3. **कीडांचा हल्ला**: पानांच्या आरोग्यावर परिणाम करणाऱ्या कीडांच्या उपस्थितीची शक्यता आहे.

अधिक अचूक निदान आणि उपचारांसाठी, कृपया प्रभावित भागांवर लक्ष केंद्रित करून एक स्पष्ट चित्र प्रदान करा, ज्यामुळे चांगली प्रकाश आणि फोकस असेल. यामुळे कोणत्याही विशिष्ट रोग किंवा कीड ओळखण्यात मदत होईल. 

जर तुम्हाला रोग किंवा कीड असल्याची शंका असेल, तर मी तुमच्या पिकाच्या वाढीच्या टप्प्यावर आधारित विशिष्ट स्प्रे शिफारसी प्रदान करू शकतो.
messages.en:
There are some problems on the leaves of your skull. The following may be considered:

1. **Fungal infection**: Brown and loose areas at the bottom of the leaves can be a sign of fungal disease, such as Panama disease or black sigatoca.
2. **Nutritional deficiency**: Yellowing of leaves and low overall health may indicate a lack of necessary nutrition.
3. **Insect attack**: The presence of insects affecting leaf health is likely.

For a more accurate diagnosis and treatment, please provide a clear picture by focusing on the affected areas, which will lead to better lighting and focus. This will help identify any specific diseases or pests. 

If you suspect you have a disease or pest, I can provide specific spray recommendations based on the stage of your crop's growth.

messages.content:
तस्वीर में दिखाई दे रहा है कि लौकी के पौधे में कुछ संभावित समस्याएँ हैं। पत्तियों में असामान्यताएँ हैं, जो कीटों के नुकसान या बीमारी का संकेत हो सकती हैं।

चूंकि मैं लौकी के पौधों के लिए विशेष स्प्रे सुझाव नहीं पा सका, मैं आपको सलाह देता हूँ कि पौधों की निकटता से निगरानी करें और किसी भी कीट या बीमारी के संकेतों पर ध्यान दें।

यदि संभव हो, तो कृपया प्रभावित क्षेत्रों पर ध्यान केंद्रित करते हुए एक स्पष्ट तस्वीर प्रदान करें, जिसमें अच्छी रोशनी और उच्च गुणवत्ता हो। इससे समस्या की पहचान अधिक सटीकता से करने में मदद मिलेगी।
messages.en:
It is seen in the picture that the gourd plant has some potential problems. There are abnormalities in the leaves, which can be a sign of pest damage or disease.

Since I could not find specific spray suggestions for gourd plants, I advise you to monitor the plants closely and pay attention to any pests or signs of disease.

If possible, please provide a clear picture, focusing on the affected areas, with good lighting and high quality. This will help identify the problem more accurately.
